name: refrigerate
effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
